refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function writes count bytes from the buffer pointed to by buf to a transparent elementary file (EF) on card. It corresponds to the ISO 7816 WRITE BINARY function. Call sc_select_file() first to select the file to write to.
This function is used to write to a newly created file, or to a a previously unused portion of a file. For updating an existing file, use the sc_update_binary() function.
The offset argument specifies the file offset in bytes. The flags argument is currently not used, and should be set to 0.

refsect1.title: Return value
refsect1.para: If successful, the number of bytes written is returned. Otherwise, a negative value is returned.
